definition.name: Amazon ECS "Render Task Definition" Action for GitHub Actions
definition.description: Inserts a container image URI into a container definition in an Amazon ECS task definition JSON file, creating a new file.
definition.author: aws-actions

inputs.name: task-definition
inputs.description: The path to the ECS task definition JSON file

inputs.name: task-definition-arn
inputs.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task definition to be used

inputs.name: task-definition-family
inputs.description: The name of a family that the task definition is registered to

inputs.name: task-definition-revision
inputs.description: The revision of the task definition being used

inputs.name: container-name
inputs.description: The name of the container or containers defined in the containerDefinitions section of the ECS task definition. If more than one container, add the names comma separated.

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: The URI of the container image to insert into the ECS task definition

inputs.name: environment-variables
inputs.description: Variables to add to the container. Each variable is of the form KEY=value, you can specify multiple variables with multi-line YAML strings.

inputs.name: log-configuration-options
inputs.description: Create/Override options inside logConfiguration. Each variable is of the form key=value, you can specify multiple variables with multi-line YAML strings.

inputs.name: docker-labels
inputs.description: Create/Override options inside dockerLabels. Each variable is key=value, you can specify multiple variables with multi-line YAML.

inputs.name: command
inputs.description: The command used by ECS to start the container image

inputs.name: env-files
inputs.description: S3 object arns to set env variables onto the container. You can specify multiple files with multi-line YAML strings.

inputs.name: secrets
inputs.description: Secrets to add to the container. Each secret is of the form KEY=valueFrom, where valueFrom is a secret arn. You can specify multiple secrets with multi-line YAML strings.

outputs.name: task-definition
outputs.description: The path to the rendered task definition file
